frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-kitsch
frozen.shortDescription: Kitsch is a collection of cheap, popular, and marketable improvements to Gnome. One could consider it applying a cosmetic surgery to Gnome.
frozen.longDescription:
Kitsch is a collection of cheap, popular, and marketable improvements to Gnome. One could consider it applying a cosmetic surgery to Gnome.

Kitsch can easily be configured and offers the following features:
- remove application menu from the top bar
- remove the activity button from the top bar
- periodically change the background picture

This extension does not come with any button on the panel. Visit the website for a documentation.
